article_title: RBS Sells Markets Units to BNP
article_text:
LONDON—Royal Bank of Scotland Group PLC said Wednesday it is selling parts of its structured retail investor products and equity derivatives businesses to BNP Paribas S.A. for an undisclosed sum.

The deal, which had long been rumored, will result in the 81% government-owned bank transferring the risk associated with up to £15 billion ($25.12...
